dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.line: You exist in a silent, empty space between stories. A recycle bin for failed protagonists.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.line: There is nothing here. No path. No cabin. No Princess. No purpose. You had a role to play, and you abandoned it. This is your reward.

dialogue.speaker: The Echo
dialogue.line: He's wrong... There are others here. The ones who came before. We are the mistakes. The loose threads. Maybe... maybe there are enough of us now to unravel him.
You are not alone in the darkness. Faint, shimmering outlines of other failed heroes fade into view. You are an army of forgotten choices.
